name: RingCentral SMSbot
description: This repository provides a simple SMSbot example

LITA_ROBOT_NAME.description: Your RingCentral Username/Phone - ex: 12225551919 - Do not use a plus sign or any special characters...only the numbers

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_appKey.description: Set this to your RingCentral app key

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_appSecret.description: Set this to your RingCentral app secret

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_USERNAME.description: Set this to your RingCentral username, e.g. main company or extension phone number

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_EXTENSION.description: Set this to your RingCentral extension

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_PASSWORD.description: Set this to your RingCentral password

LITA_ADAPTERS_RINGCENTRAL_smsNumber.description: This is the SMS-enabled RingCentral number you wish to use for receiving and sending SMSbot chat

LITA_HANDLERS_ZENDESK_SUBDOMAIN.description: Set this to your Zendesk subdomain

LITA_HANDLERS_ZENDESK_authType.description: Set this to your auth type, password or token

LITA_HANDLERS_ZENDESK_USER.description: Set this to your Zendesk user email

LITA_HANDLERS_ZENDESK_TOKEN.description: Set this to your Zendesk token if using token auth

LITA_HANDLERS_ZENDESK_PASSWORD.description: Set this to your Zendesk password if using password auth
